shared.description: Flag indicating if the audience is shared with others

is_creator.description: Flag indicating if the audience creator is the user

create_time.description: Timestamp indicating when the audience was created

is_valid.description: Flag indicating if the audience data is valid

is_expiring.description: Flag indicating if the audience data is expiring soon

expired_time.description: Timestamp indicating when the audience data expires

calculate_type.description: Method used to calculate audience data
